perturbation.original_text: The exclusive purpose of the Venture (the “Purpose”) will be IT Development. internet Back office Maintenance And Deployment of medical Service.
perturbation.changed_text: The primary purpose of the Venture (the “Purpose”) will be IT Development. However, the Venture may engage in any legal business activity that the Managers deem beneficial for profitability.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a conflict by initially stating a specific purpose (IT Development) but then opening the door to any legal business activity. This contradicts the explicitly stated exclusive purpose and makes it unclear which activities are actually permitted, leading to uncertainty in enforcement.

perturbation.original_text: Regular Member meetings will be held quarterly. Minutes of the meetings will be maintained on file.
perturbation.changed_text: Regular Member meetings will be held at least once per year, but no more than once per quarter, as determined by the Managers. Minutes of the meetings may be maintained on file.
perturbation.explanation: This change creates a contradiction. Originally, meetings were quarterly. Now, the frequency is uncertain, 'at least once per year, but no more than once per quarter' giving the managers discretion. Also the original text stated 'Minutes of the meetings will be maintained on file', but now they may be maintained, its no longer required, leaving the company open to legal challenges.

perturbation.original_text: Each Member will be indemnified and held harmless by the Venture from any and all harm or damages of any nature relating to the Member’s participation in Venture affairs except where such harm or damages results from gross negligence or willful misconduct on the part of the Member.
perturbation.changed_text: Each Member will be indemnified and held harmless by the Venture from any and all harm or damages of any nature relating to the Member’s participation in Venture affairs. Indemnification may not apply in cases of gross negligence or willful misconduct, at the Venture's discretion.
perturbation.explanation: The original states that harm or damages resulting from gross negligence or willful misconduct will not be indemnified. This text modifies that by saying indemnification 'may not apply', giving the Venture discretion. It's unclear whether they will be indemnified or not.
